meanings.definition: Able to be decoded or understood.
meanings.sent1: The secret message was decipherable with the help of a codebook.
meanings.sent2: The handwriting on the old letter was barely decipherable.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map was so decipherable that even a parrot could figure it out.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a decipherable puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The ancient symbols on the tablet were surprisingly decipherable to the archaeologist.

meanings.sent1: The instructions on the sign were decipherable despite the fading paint.
meanings.sent2: The meaning behind her words was not always decipherable to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meows were decipherable enough for the owner to know it wanted food.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky formed a decipherable pattern to the stargazer.
meanings.sent5: The smile on her face was a decipherable sign of happiness.
